Requirement_Description: Audit Trail and Logging (WORM logs + LGPD compliance + Cryptographic signatures)
LIS/HIS Integration API (REST + OIDC/OAuth2 + Rate limiting 100 req/min)
Alert System Configuration (Per-institution thresholds + Prioritization + Throttling + Dual approval)
ML Model Versioning and Rollback (Git SHA tracking + A/B testing + Drift detection + <15min rollback)
Role-Based Access Control - RBAC (4 roles: Admin/Lab/Physician/Auditor + MFA + Session timeout)
Data Retention and Archival (5-year retention + LGPD Art. 18 data subject rights + Automated archival)
Clinical Rules Specification and Maintenance (YAML/JSON + Git versioning + Annual clinical review)
Multi-Language Support (pt-BR | en-US | es-ES + i18n framework + Clinical SME translation review)
Performance Monitoring and Degradation Alerts (P95/P99 tracking + Anomaly detection + Runbooks)
Integration with External Terminology Servers (SNOMED CT | LOINC | ICD-10 + Fallback embedded DB)
Batch Processing Mode (CSV/Parquet + 10K cases/hour + De-identification + Resource isolation)
